name: Venera Mushey
description:
V1.1

*BEST TO PLAY IN HD FULLSCREEN* (Check bottom right for Fullscreen Button)

Kill your friend for the win, like you would in real life!

Venera Mushey is a game where you and your friend is having some difficulties with your legs functioning on venus,

but you still feel the need to kill each other.

Well worry not, Lady Venera is giving out free weapons,

and along with them is a mysterious portal gun...

Do view the in-game tutorial, it is a tutorial, it helps.

Enjoy, and don't let the other bastard walk out of your place alive.

My music will be on soundcloud sooner or later. (Untitled Track 121 - Master Greentea)

-huhu
